001package com.github.sormuras.bach.conventional;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.Command;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.Grabber;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.ToolCall;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.ToolFinder;
008import com.github.sormuras.bach.ToolRun;
009import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.Composer;
010import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.DefaultCommand;
011import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JLinkCommand;
012import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JUnitCommand;
013import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JarCommand;
014import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JavacCommand;
015import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JavadocCommand;
016import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.ModulePathsOption;
017import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ModuleFinderSupport;
018import java.io.File;
019import java.lang.module.ModuleFinder;
020import java.nio.file.Files;
021import java.nio.file.Path;
022import java.util.ArrayList;
023
024/** This interface contains the methods to build a convential project space. */
025public interface ConventionalBuilder {
026
027  Bach bach();
028
029  ConventionalSpace space();
030
031  default void grab(Grabber grabber, String... externalModules) {
032    grabber.grabExternalModules(externalModules);
033    grabber.grabMissingExternalModules();
034  }
035
036  default void compile() {
037    compile(Composer.identity(), Composer.identity());
038  }
039
040  default void compile(Composer<JavacCommand> javacComposer) {
041    compile(javacComposer, Composer.identity());
042  }
043
044  default void compile(Composer<JavacCommand> javacComposer, Composer<JarCommand> jarComposer) {
045    var classesDirectory = outputDirectoryForClasses();
046    var javac =
047        new JavacCommand()
048            .release(space().release().orElse(null))
049            .modules(space().toModuleNames())
050            .option(space().moduleSourcePaths())
051            .option(computeModulePathOption())
052            .outputDirectoryForClasses(classesDirectory);
053    bach().run(javacComposer.apply(javac));
054
055    var modulesDirectory = outputDirectoryForModules();
056    bach().run(Command.of("directories", "clean", modulesDirectory));
057    var jars = new ArrayList<JarCommand>();
058    for (var module : space().modules()) {
059      var jarCommand =
060          new JarCommand()
061              .mode("--create")
062              .file(modulesDirectory.resolve(module.name() + ".jar"))
063              .main(module.main().orElse(null))
064              .filesAdd(classesDirectory.resolve(module.name()));
065      jars.add(jarComposer.apply(jarCommand));
066    }
067    jars.parallelStream().forEach(bach()::run);
068  }
069
070  default void document(Composer<JavadocCommand> javadocComposer) {
071    var api = bach().path().workspace(space().name().orElse(""), "documentation", "api");
072    var javadoc =
073        Command.javadoc()
074            .add("--module", String.join(",", space().toModuleNames()))
075            .add(
076                "--module-source-path",
077                String.join(File.pathSeparator, space().moduleSourcePaths().values()))
078            .add("-d", api);
079    if (!space().modulePaths().isPresent()) {
080      javadoc = javadoc.add("--module-path", space().modulePaths().join(File.pathSeparator));
081    }
082
083    bach().run(javadocComposer.apply(javadoc));
084
085    var jar =
086        Command.jar()
087            .mode("--create")
088            .file(api.getParent().resolve("api.zip"))
089            .add("--no-manifest")
090            .filesAdd(api);
091    bach().run(jar);
092  }
093
094  default void link(Composer<JLinkCommand> jlinkComposer) {
095    var image = bach().path().workspace(space().name().orElse(""), "image");
096    var jlink =
097        Command.jlink()
098            .add("--output", image)
099            .add("--add-modules", String.join(",", space().toModuleNames()))
100            .add(
101                "--module-path",
102                String.join(
103                    File.pathSeparator,
104                    outputDirectoryForModules().toString(),
105                    bach().path().externalModules().toString()));
106
107    bach().run("directories", run -> run.add("delete").add(image));
108    bach().run(jlinkComposer.apply(jlink));
109  }
110
111  default Path outputDirectoryForClasses() {
112    return bach().path().workspace(space().name().orElse(""), "classes");
113  }
114
115  default Path outputDirectoryForModules() {
116    return bach().path().workspace(space().name().orElse(""), "modules");
117  }
118
119  default Path outputDirectoryForReports() {
120    return bach().path().workspace(space().name().orElse(""), "reports");
121  }
122
123  private ModulePathsOption computeModulePathOption() {
124    var option = space().modulePaths();
125    var externalModules = bach().path().externalModules();
126    if (option.values().contains(externalModules)) return option;
127    if (!Files.isDirectory(externalModules)) return option;
128    return option.add(externalModules);
129  }
130
131  private ModuleFinder computeRuntimeModuleFinder() {
132    var paths = new ArrayList<Path>();
133    paths.add(outputDirectoryForModules());
134    paths.addAll(computeModulePathOption().values());
135    return ModuleFinder.of(paths.toArray(Path[]::new));
136  }
137
138  default ConventionalSpace newDependentConventionalSpace(String name) {
139    return ConventionalSpace.of(bach(), name).modulePaths(outputDirectoryForModules());
140  }
141
142  default void runAllTests() {
143    bach().logCaption("Run all tests in %s space".formatted(space().name().orElse("this")));
144    var moduleFinder = computeRuntimeModuleFinder();
145    for (var module : space().modules()) {
146      var name = module.name();
147      if (ModuleFinderSupport.findMainClass(moduleFinder, name).isPresent()) {
148        runModule(moduleFinder, name, Composer.identity(), bach().printer()::print);
149      }
150      var toolFinder = ToolFinder.of(moduleFinder, true, name);
151      runTool(toolFinder, "test", Composer.identity(), bach().printer()::print);
152      if (toolFinder.find("junit").isPresent()) runJUnit(toolFinder, name);
153    }
154  }
155
156  default void runModule(String module, Composer<DefaultCommand> composer) {
157    runModule(computeRuntimeModuleFinder(), module, composer, bach().printer()::print);
158  }
159
160  default void runModule(
161      ModuleFinder finder,
162      String module,
163      Composer<DefaultCommand> composer,
164      ToolRun.Visitor visitor) {
165    var command = composer.apply(Command.of(module));
166    var call = ToolCall.module(finder, command);
167    var run = bach().run(call);
168    visitor.accept(run);
169  }
170
171  default void runTool(String tool, Composer<DefaultCommand> composer) {
172    var toolFinder = ToolFinder.of(computeRuntimeModuleFinder(), true);
173    runTool(toolFinder, tool, composer, bach().printer()::print);
174  }
175
176  default void runTool(
177      ToolFinder finder, String tool, Composer<DefaultCommand> composer, ToolRun.Visitor visitor) {
178    for (var provider : finder.list(tool)) {
179      var singleton = ToolFinder.of(provider);
180      var command = composer.apply(Command.of(tool));
181      var call = ToolCall.of(singleton, command);
182      var run = bach().run(call);
183      visitor.accept(run);
184    }
185  }
186
187  default void runJUnit(String module) {
188    var toolFinder = ToolFinder.of(computeRuntimeModuleFinder(), true, module);
189    runJUnit(toolFinder, module);
190  }
191
192  default void runJUnit(ToolFinder finder, String module) {
193    runJUnit(finder, module, Composer.identity(), ToolRun.Visitor.noop());
194  }
195
196  default void runJUnit(
197      ToolFinder finder, String module, Composer<JUnitCommand> composer, ToolRun.Visitor visitor) {
198    var reports = outputDirectoryForReports().resolve("junit/" + module);
199    var junit = Command.junit().add("--select-module", module).add("--reports-dir", reports);
200    var call = ToolCall.of(finder, composer.apply(junit));
201    var run = bach().run(call);
202    visitor.accept(run);
203  }
204}
